dcterms:creator: V. Hedau
D. Hoiem
D. A. Forsyth
dcterms:description: A dataset containing indoor images used for recovering the spatial layout of cluttered rooms, which includes various challenges such as occlusions and illumination variations.
dcterms:title: Indoor images from Hedau et al.

dcterms:creator: N. Silberman
D. Hoiem
P. Kohli
R. Fergus
dcterms:description: A dataset of RGB-D images specifically designed for indoor segmentation and support inference, providing depth information to enhance scene understanding.
dcterms:title: RGB-D images for indoor segmentation and support inference

dcterms:creator: L. D. Pero
J. Guan
E. Brau
J. Schlecht
K. Barnard
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on sampling bedrooms, providing a collection of images that capture various bedroom layouts and features.
dcterms:title: Bedrooms dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Biswas
M. M. Veloso
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides depth camera data for indoor mobile robot localization and navigation, facilitating research in robotic perception and navigation.
dcterms:title: Depth camera based indoor mobile robot localization and navigation

dcterms:creator: X. Ren
L. Bo
D. Fox
dcterms:description: A dataset for RGB-D scene labeling, providing features and algorithms for labeling scenes based on RGB-D data.
dcterms:title: RGB-D scene labeling dataset
